question: 凸版
sourceMnemonic: Press <kanji>uneven</kanji> carvings into paper to make the newest <kanji>edition</kanji> of your magazine. What you're using is a <vocabulary>letterpress</vocabulary>. This made mass printing nice and cheap(ish) in Japan!
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own. Watch out because <ja>はん</ja> becomes <ja>ぱん</ja> here.
